TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content:
WCOLE360

CBM shall not go to anything else other than CBM

Why the Buran? I know that it's a pretty shuttle, but I would point out that if you're trying for historical accuracy then the actual US shuttle would be in order.

Are Launch Vehicles included for the resupply ships as well?

So... no any delivery or ressuply craft in ISS pack. Only ISS station parts.

If you dont like Buran use any other vechicle... Im like use buran to ISS ressuply and construction.

The fact that no one has yet made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹an addon shuttle, definitely not my problem.

I saw in the forum, those with 4-5 different shuttles in various stages of completion, try to write their authors.

what about buran to PMA.

Need ask Devo
the buran docking port is also abit to big for the PMA docking port.

CBM cannot dock to any other port because it is "nodeType = size5" whereas most other ports are "nodeType = size1".

I fixed this in my own .cfg however the CBM still would not work
Im ask again. CBM to CBM work good?
I'm not at home, 30 minutes till I try? bobcat I need pm you somethin.

Im ask again. CBM to CBM work good?

Yes, two ISS CBM's dock good.

Edited May 19, 2013 by lpam
no ISS CBM to ISS CBM

Yes, two stock CBM's dock good.

Doesn't work for me.

Downloaded 0.04?

Edit: If it doesn't work right now, just replace them with stock docking ports temporarily.

no ISS CBM to ISS CBM

Sorry I ment two ISS CBM's. They work fine for me.
It works for some but not for others. Ipam what type computer are you using, and Xilent what about you?
I'm using a mac, ISS CBM to CBM doesn't work, neither does PMA to anything. Every time I try to autodock with ORDA or mechjeb it wants to connect at a 90-degree angle.
PMA doesn't work, period, at the moment. Don't use auto dockers with the CBM, it doesn't work, bobcat and I were discussing that earlier. I'm on a mac too, I got it to work.

It works for some but not for others. what type computer are you using, and Xilent what about you?

Don't use auto dockers with the CBM, it doesn't work,

I have a Samsung Laptop, i3 processor and 4gb ram. windows 7. Nothing special. When I have been testing what ports work with which I use auto dock with MechJeb 2.0

Edited May 19, 2013 by lpam
Yep, CBM to CBM work fine. Chek plugins folder etc.

PMA doesn't work, period, at the moment. Don't use auto dockers with the CBM, it doesn't work, bobcat and I were discussing that earlier. I'm on a mac too, I got it to work.

Is there anything you changed to get it to work? Cause I still can't.

Edit: Ok, after reinstalling the parts it seems to be working CBM to CBM. Now to get it working with the KerbX Dragon port by changing the size of the dragon's port to 5.

Edit2: That worked!

Edited May 19, 2013 by spawnofbill

I apologize for the blur.

My ISS is complete. Rough model of pirs included as well as a dragon spacecraft.

Ok, this is weird. Now I can't get anything to dock with the mir ports. If i place a drogue on a different ship it'll work fine, but they won't work on Zarya or the FGB.

Edited May 20, 2013 by spawnofbill

Very nice! Also, Bobcat the S4/S6 and P4/P6 Truss pieces are perfect except they're missing the radiators.

I'm just starting to build it piece by piece so any bugs I encounter I'll post. So far the biggest problem is putting it together with the Buran for me, but I know that's not your problem...

Edited May 20, 2013 by Good_Apollo

Good_Apollo

The radiators are not necessary yet, plus bobcat knows they're not there. And he also had to make Columbus, FGB, Node2/3, Destiny, all the trusses, Rassvet, etc.
Oh don't get me wrong I'm not pointing it out to say 'hey you ****ed up work harder' just thought it was possible he didn't notice. I've never been as thrilled with addons as I've been with bobcats.

Love the looks of this addon

Only problem is i cant dock at any of the ports with Bruan :/
A quick question guys seeing as I can't play the game at work how do the trusses dock together? Do they just attract each other like docking ports?
There is a small trapez-shaped docking port under the last tab in the VAB. That's their docking mechanism.
What is everyones strategy for using the Buran arm? Mine is to dock the Buran and go extremely slow and then use RCS to dock everything else.
